explains: v. 严重破坏；<旧>严重破坏
wordGroup: wreak havoc 肆虐；造成严重破坏
play havoc with 毁坏；使陷入大混乱

sentences.en: Continuing strikes are beginning to play havoc with the national economy.
sentences.cn: 持续的罢工开始严重破坏国家经济。

sentences.en: The storm wrought havoc in the south.
sentences.cn: 这场暴风雨在南方造成了巨大的灾害。

sentences.en: These insects can wreak havoc on crops.
sentences.cn: 这些昆虫可严重危害农作物。
